title: Don’t Jump Off of that Cliff

lines.content: Don’t jump off of that cliff:
For example, you could jump right into moving traffic,
Drive ditzy drunk and get yourself into an accident,
You could overdose on your favorite drug,
Slit your wrist and play in your very own puddle of blood—it’s fun!
You could always just take a bath and relax;
With a little toaster as a companion to add.
Shooting yourself in the mouth always works,
So remember: Don’t jump off of that cliff,
When there are so many fun options to pick;
Have a little fun and get a little creative.
